1. **Identify all interest receivable transactions**:

   - The "amount" and "after_tax_amount" can give us the recognized interest income per transaction.
   - The "payment/receipt_status" distinguishes between "Paid" and "Unpaid" interest receivables.
   - Only the "Paid" interest will be recognized as actual interest income in the income statement.
